Name: Avoidant Behavior
Flavor: A beginner's guide to not being a grownup.
Effect: Reveal when performing an action. Choose another player. Place your mess card in their envelope instead of the room you're currently in.

Name: Geolocation for Dummies
Flavor: You can run but you can't hide.
Effect: Reveal during your turn. You may look at one player's room envelope. Do not open the envelope, only look at the outside.

Name: Intermittent Fasting
Flavor: It's not a real diet unless you tell everyone about it.
Effect: At the end of the game, if you have 0 food cards, this card is worth 3 points. Otherwise, it's worth 0 points.

Name: Fatalism
Effect: Reveal when challenged, after your opponent has guessed a room. Flip a coin. Heads: the challenge is ignored. Tails: the challenge is successful.

Name: The Art of Finger Pointing.
Flavor: You're never in the wrong if someone else is wronger.
Effect: Reveal when you are successfully challenged. Choose any opponent. They must reveal their face-down reward cards to you. If they have a face-down card from your room, they must accept the mess cards from your room.

Name: Art of War
Flavor: Always know where your enemy is.
Effect: Reveal during your turn, and guess which room a player is in (cannot guess the Hallway). They must show you their room. If you were right, they must reveal their room to everyone. If you are wrong, you must reveal your room to everyone.
